name: IPQualityScore
description: This app implements IP, URL and Email investigative capabilities utilizing IPQualityScore

actions.description: Validates the connectivity by querying IPQualityScore

actions.verbose: If email information is unavailable in IPQualityScore, only 'email' and 'message' property would be populated. The 'strictness' is an optional parameter to perform (higher number) or ignore (lower number) of additional intelligence checks. The possible values for 'strictness' are 0,1 and 2.

email.description: Email to query for reputation information
email.name: email

fast.description: Enables or disables SMTP check with the mail service provider
fast.name: fast

suggest_domain.description: Force analyze if the email address's domain has a typo and should be corrected to a popular mail service
suggest_domain.name: suggest_domain

timeout.description: Maximum number of seconds to wait for a reply from a mail service provider
timeout.name: timeout

strictness.description: Sets how strictly spam traps and honeypots are detected by system (Possible Values: 0, 1 and 2)
strictness.name: strictness

abuse_strictness.description: Set the strictness level for machine learning pattern recognition of abusive email addresses
abuse_strictness.name: abuse_strictness

actions.description: Queries IPQualityScore's malicious URL scanner API
actions.verbose: If URL information is unavailable in IPQualityScore, only 'url' and 'in_database' property would be populated. The 'strictness' is an optional parameter to perform (higher number) or ignore (lower number) of additional intelligence checks. The possible values for 'strictness' are 0,1 and 2.

url.description: URL to query for reputation information
url.name: url

strictness.description: How strict should we scan this URL? (Possible Values: 0, 1 and 2)
strictness.name: strictness

fast.description: The API will provide quicker response times using lighter checks and analysis when enabled. This setting defaults to "false".
fast.name: fast

actions.description: Queries IPQualityScore's Proxy and VPN detection API
actions.verbose: If URL information is unavailable in IPQualityScore, only 'message' and 'status_code' properties would be populated. The 'strictness' is an optional parameter to perform (higher number) or ignore (lower number) of additional intelligence checks. The possible values for 'strictness' are 0,1 and 2.

ip.description: IP to query for reputation information
ip.name: ip

strictness.description: How in depth (strict) do you want this query to be? (Possible Values: 0, 1 and 2)
strictness.name: strictness

mobile.description: Specifies if this lookup should be treated as a mobile device
mobile.name: mobile

allow_public_access_points.description: Specifies if this lookup should be treated as a mobile device
allow_public_access_points.name: allow_public_access_points

lighter_penalties.description: Enable this setting to lower detection rates and Fraud Scores for mixed quality IP addresses
lighter_penalties.name: lighter_penalties

transaction_strictness.description: Adjusts the weights for penalties applied due to irregularities
transaction_strictness.name: transaction_strictness

actions.verbose: The IPQS Phone Number Validation API enables you to quickly analyze phone numbers to verify their risk score, country of origin, carrier, validity, owner information, and line connection status. This enables you to verify users, improve chargeback defense, and detect fraudulent activity in real-time. The IPQS Phone Number Validation API can research landline and cellular numbers in over 150 countries to identify invalid phone numbers or malicious users.

phone.description: Phone Number you want to fetch reputation data
phone.name: phone

strictness.description: How in depth (strict) do you want this reputation check to be? Stricter checks may provide a higher false-positive rate. We recommend starting at "0", the lowest strictness setting, and increasing to "1" or "2" depending on your levels of fraud
strictness.name: strictness

country.description: You can optionally provide us with the default country or countries(comma separated) this phone number is suspected to be associated with. Our system will prefer to use a country on this list for verification or will require a country to be specified in the event the phone number is less than 10 digits
country.name: country

example_values: Disabled for performance. Contact support for further assistance.

actions.description: Queries IPQualityScore's Dark Web Leak API
actions.verbose: Use the leaked data API to search through a wide collection of breached, stolen, and leaked databases from popular websites that have recently suffered data breaches. Look up email addresses, phone numbers, usernames, or passwords. Perform on-demand leaked data searches using our dark web data API.

type.description: Type of data you are submitting
type.name: type
